segments.text: Good evening , ma'am . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'd like to use a safety deposit box .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will the object fit into this size of box ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . I think it's OK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you fill out this form , please , ma'am ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , ma'am . Would you like to use it until May 20th ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This way , please . Your box number is 522 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you would like to use the contents during the period of use , please come here in person . After confirming your signature , we will open the box .
segments.speaker: S1
